classifiers: Topic :: Multimedia :: Graphics :: Capture :: Screen Capture
info.keywords: scrcpy, android, adbutils, av, numpy, DearPyGui, Pygame, adb, pyaudio
info.name: mysc
info.summary: A Scrcpy client implemented in Python. Gui with dearpygui/pygame. With Video, Audio, also Control. GUI Supports Key Proxy, Extensions, window position record, right-click gesture control, File Manager, Virtual Camera, UHID Keyboard and Chinese input and more.
